title: Sustainable Finance in Emerging Markets is Enjoying Rapid Growth, But May Bring Risks - International Monetary Fund
content: Sustainable Finance in Emerging Markets is Enjoying Rapid Growth, But May Bring Risks  International Monetary Fund
description:
By Deepali Gautam, Rohit Goel and Fabio Natalucci
 Financial stability concerns include potentially higher sensitivity to global financial conditions.
Most of the activity in the  rapidly growing world of sustainable finance  has been previously concentrated in advanced economies, but emerging markets, while still a small share of the total,
